disp-quote.p: Female 1: “Hmm, yes. In my case, someone told me that I need to take precautionary measures. So, I started buying vitamins at that moment. So, I was using vitamins during my chikungunya infection, and I am still buying vitamins every month, in order to maintain a good immune system. So that I do not get that disease anymore. ” Female 2: “Yes, so she thinks that eating healthy will protect her and you from being bitten. Right? ” Female 1: “ Yes, No. In my opinion, it is not about eating healthy; it is about vitamins. It is not about eating healthy, but the immune system needs to stay high so that it (chikungunya) does not come back. “ Female 2: “Yes, so that they do not get the disease anymore. ”
